text: Schedule update for me - Iâ€™ll be out this Friday (the 17th) and then working remotely for the next two weeks from Mexico City (with the 21st and 27th as OOO days) but in general I plan on being available and online during working hours.
<!channel> Heads up for the offsite tomorrow. There will be drinks and snacks but it's probably best to have lunch beforehand!

The passcode to get through the doorman at Ground Control tomorrow is...COMPASS. You'll *need* to know this to get in, it's a private event and they won't be letting people through without the secret word :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
